item.title: link collection #4
item.description: I’m a bit behind on this section, I know. Here’s the first batch: currently reading: Growing Object-Oriented Software, Guided by Tests Implementing Domain-Driven Design c# stuff: Mark Seemann’s on Bastard Injection foreach vs ForEach sql stuff:

item.title: link collection #3
item.description: JavaScript stuff: Basics of NodeJS and ExpressJS: REST, Authentication, Sessions Another great tutorial on SPAs: Authentication in Single Page Applications If you’re in for using JavaScript for your complete stack, try MEAN: mean.

item.title: link collection #2
item.description: I attended the Herbstcampus 2013 this month. As usual, a very good conference. Here is some fun stuff I learned: NancyFx is to ASP.NET as Sinatra is to Ruby-on-Rails. Simple.

item.title: link collection #1
item.description: When I try to learn new technologies I stumble across many sites. If a site is useful to the problem at hand, I normally add a comment in my source code referencing the URL.
